title: Sound On: U.S. Afghanistan Strategy with Taliban
itunes:title: Sound On: U.S. Afghanistan Strategy with Taliban
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Massachusetts Congressman Jake Auchincloss, Tony Capaccio, Bloomberg News Pentagon reporter, Justin Sink, Bloomberg News White House reporter, and Michael O'Hanlon, Senior Fellow and Director of Research in Foreign Policy at the Brookings Institution.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
